uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Universally unique identifier (https://minecraft.wiki/w/Universally_unique_identifier) of an entity in the world

data.title: Entity Data
data.description: SNBT-formatted string (https://minecraft.wiki/w/NBT_format#SNBT_format) containing entity data (https://minecraft.wiki/w/Entity_format#Entity_format) information that should be changed
